00008 #include "NetworkDeviceManager.h"
00009 #include "MessageUtil.h"
00010 
00011 NetworkDeviceManager::NetworkDeviceManager(ros::NodeHandle& handle, NMClient* client) :
00012     m_handle(handle), m_client(client), msg_seq(0), device_pub(
00013         handle.advertise<NetworkDevices>("oryx_network_devices", 10, true))
00014 {
00015   ROS_INFO("Initing Network Device Manager");
00016   publish_devices();
00017   g_signal_connect(m_client, "device-added", G_CALLBACK (device_added_cb), this);
00018   g_signal_connect(m_client, "device-removed", G_CALLBACK (device_removed_cb), this);
00019 
00020   const GPtrArray *devices = nm_client_get_devices(m_client);
00021   for (unsigned int i = 0; devices && (i < devices->len); i++)
00022   {
00023     NMDevice *device = NM_DEVICE(g_ptr_array_index (devices, i));
00024     process_added_device(device);
00025   }
00026 }
00027 
00028 void NetworkDeviceManager::process_added_device(NMDevice *device)
00029 {
00030   ROS_INFO("Network Device Added: %s", nm_device_get_iface(device));
00031   g_signal_connect(device, "state-changed", G_CALLBACK (device_state_changed_cb), this);
00032 
00033   NetworkDevice device_info;
00034   fill_device_info(device, device_info);
00035   devices[nm_device_get_iface(device)] = device_info;
00036 
00037   publish_devices();
00038 }
00039 void NetworkDeviceManager::process_removed_device(NMDevice *device)
00040 {
00041   ROS_INFO("Network Device Removed: %s", nm_device_get_iface(device));
00042   //g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func(device, (gpointer)G_CALLBACK (device_state_changed_cb), this);
00043 
00044   devices.erase(nm_device_get_iface(device));
00045 
00046   publish_devices();
00047 }
00048 void NetworkDeviceManager::process_device_state_changed(NMDevice *device, NMDeviceState state)
00049 {
00050   ROS_INFO("Network Device State Changed: %s -> %d", nm_device_get_iface(device), state);
00051 
00052   NetworkDevice device_info;
00053   fill_device_info(device, device_info);
00054   devices[nm_device_get_iface(device)] = device_info;
00055 
00056   publish_devices();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void NetworkDeviceManager::fill_device_info(NMDevice* device, NetworkDevice& ros_device_message)
00060 {
00061   ros_device_message.iface = nm_device_get_iface(device);
00062   ros_device_message.product = nm_device_get_product(device);
00063   ros_device_message.state = nm_device_get_state(device);
00064 
00065   ros_device_message.driver = nm_device_get_driver(device);
00066 
00067   if (NM_IS_DEVICE_WIFI (device))
00068   {
00069     ros_device_message.hardware_address = nm_device_wifi_get_hw_address(NM_DEVICE_WIFI (device) );
00070     ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::WIFI_DEVICE;
00071   }
00072   else if (NM_IS_DEVICE_ETHERNET(device))
00073   {
00074     ros_device_message.hardware_address = nm_device_ethernet_get_hw_address(NM_DEVICE_ETHERNET (device) );
00075     ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::ETHERNET_DEVICE;
00076   }
00077   else if (NM_IS_DEVICE_MODEM (device))
00078   {
00079     NMDeviceModemCapabilities caps = nm_device_modem_get_current_capabilities(NM_DEVICE_MODEM(device) );
00080     if (caps & NM_DEVICE_MODEM_CAPABILITY_GSM_UMTS)
00081       ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::GSM_DEVICE;
00082     else if (caps & NM_DEVICE_MODEM_CAPABILITY_CDMA_EVDO)
00083       ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::CDMA_DEVICE;
00084     else
00085       ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::MOBILE_BROADBAND_DEVICE;
00086   }
00087   else if (NM_IS_DEVICE_WIMAX(device))
00088   {
00089     ros_device_message.hardware_address = nm_device_wimax_get_hw_address(NM_DEVICE_WIMAX (device) );
00090     ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::WIMAX_DEVICE;
00091   }
00092   else
00093   {
00094     ros_device_message.device_type = oryx_network_manager::NetworkDevice::OTHER_DEVICE;
00095   }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void NetworkDeviceManager::publish_devices()
00099 {
00100   NetworkDevices devices_message;
00101   std::map<std::string, NetworkDevice>::iterator itr = devices.begin();
00102   for (; itr != devices.end(); ++itr)
00103     devices_message.list.push_back(itr->second);
00104   fill_header_message(devices_message.header, msg_seq++);
00105   device_pub.publish(devices_message);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void NetworkDeviceManager::device_added_cb(NMClient *client, NMDevice *device, gpointer user_data)
00109 {
00110   NetworkDeviceManager* manager = (NetworkDeviceManager*) user_data;
00111   manager->process_added_device(device);
00112 }
00113 void NetworkDeviceManager::device_removed_cb(NMClient *client, NMDevice *device, gpointer user_data)
00114 {
00115   NetworkDeviceManager* manager = (NetworkDeviceManager*) user_data;
00116   manager->process_removed_device(device);
00117 }
00118 void NetworkDeviceManager::device_state_changed_cb(NMDevice *device, NMDeviceState state, guint arg2, guint arg3,
00119     gpointer user_data)
00120 {
00121   NetworkDeviceManager* manager = (NetworkDeviceManager*) user_data;
00122   manager->process_device_state_changed(device, state);
00123 }
